=Descarga de paquetes=
==Desde Google Code==
You can download the _JAR_ packages directly from [http://code.google.com/p/javaclassesrepository/downloads/list Downloads Directory].

==Repositories (Debian / Ubuntu)==
The libraries can be installed from a Debian / Ubuntu package repository.

===Repository Installation===
_Repository APT:_
{{{
deb http://downloads.hds-solutions.net/ubuntu schimpf java
deb http://downloads.hds-solutions.net/ubuntu schimpf-updates java
}}}
_GPG key installation:_
{{{
wget -q http://downloads.hds-solutions.net/hds-solutions.gpg.key -O - | apt-key add -
}}}
===Available Packages===
====libschimpf-all-java====
Depends on the 5 (five) Schimpf library packages.

====libschimpf-util-java====
Package with the classes on _*org.schimpf.util.`*`*_

====libschimpf-awt-java====
Package with the classes on _*org.schimpf.awt.`*`*_

====libschimpf-java-java====
Package with the classes on .schimpf.java.`*`*_

====libschimpf-net-java====
Package with the classes on _*org.schimpf.net.`*`*_

_*Depends on*_:
 * libtrilead-ssh2-java
 * libgeronimo-javamail-1.4-spec-java
 * _libschimpf-util-java_
 * _libschimpf-java-java_

====libschimpf-sql-java====
Package with the classes on _*org.schimpf.sql.`*`*_

_*Depends on*_:
 * libmysql-java
 * libpg-java
 * _libschimpf-util-java_
 * _libschimpf-net-java_
